TopicTitle: OSX KSP1.4 Installer - how to get it to work?

Articles.Content:
Seriously...  Downloaded 1.4.  Tried to run the installer.  And...  No Joy.

People, please can someone address this?  Its been going on forever.

Squad was too cheap to deal with it.

Take Two seems no different.

 

I can get the game to run via exposing the package contents, but seriously, is that they way it should work?  What about new OSX customers? 

Edited March 10, 2018 by Wallygator
